cause.description:
End sadness around the world by being a more humane person. Show sympathy and compassion to people. Treat others the way you would like to be treated and the world will be a better place.
1. Treat others the way you would like to be treated
2. Everyone deserves the feeling of happiness
3. "An eye for an eye and the whole world is blind" - Gandhi
cause.name: Stop Sadness Together
